entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
